ISSUE.TITLE: digdag-ui can't show task log when use of HTTP Basic Authentication
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi. digdag-ui can't show task log when connected through a proxy server. Using Nginx and restricting access with HTTP Basic Authentication. In that situation, we always get a `401 (Unauthorized)` Error. See below. (Left: Normal, Right: Through Proxy) ![2017-10-02 21 04 39](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4961885/31076499-5ada6272-a7b5-11e7-9b88-6bedb734ef64.png)
